sentence: Now a division foe of the Eagles, Wentz gives the Commanders a stable starter after a revolving door that has included Alex Smith, first-round pick Dwayne Haskins, Ryan Fitzpatrick and Taylor Heinicke.
title: New Commander: Washington to acquire QB Carson Wentz

sentence: With Turner, Washington has started six different quarterbacks: Dwayne Haskins, Kyle Allen, Alex Smith, Taylor Heinicke, Ryan Fitzpatrick and Garrett Gilbert.
author: Matthew Paras
title: Commanders give offensive coordinator Scott Turner mutli-year extension

sentence: While some of his predecessors at the position like Ryan Fitzpatrick and Alex Smith were more charismatic and more established, respectively, Wentz confidently handled his debut at the podium.
author: Peter Hailey
title: A Pivotal Partnership Between Carson Wentz and Ron Rivera Officially Begins
